sentences.english: ObjectiveTo investigate the in vitro antitumor action of the different extracts of different solvents from Ganoderma lipsiense.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨树舌灵芝各溶剂提取物的抗癌作用。

sentences.english: Will we ever win the war on cancer?
sentences.chinese: 我们究竟能不能赢得抗癌战役？

sentences.english: Kangai Baojin Decoction had proved to be the role of reliving toxicity and adding efficiency.
sentences.chinese: 证明抗癌保金方在肺癌化疗中确有减毒增效的作用。

sentences.english: These results suggest that the antimutagenic and anticancer effect of White Tea are better than that of Green Tea.
sentences.chinese: 由此得出，白茶的抗突变和体外抗癌效果好于绿茶。

sentences.english: This model can also be applied to the simulation of the effects of other anti-neoplastic drugs on cancer cells.
sentences.chinese: 该模型亦可用于其他抗癌药物治疗效果的计算机模拟。

sentences.english: Objective To determine the sensitivity of salivary adenoid cystic carcinoma cells to anticancer agents.
sentences.chinese: 目的检测涎腺腺样囊性癌对抗癌药物的敏感程度。

sentences.english: Aim To improve the target activity of anticancer medicines and reduce their untoward effects.
sentences.chinese: 目的提高现有抗癌药物的靶向性，降低其不良反应。

sentences.english: Anti-cancer drug via oral or intravenous injection into the blood circulation to the body.
sentences.chinese: 抗癌药物可经由口服或静脉注射进入血液循环到全身。

sentences.english: Can provide a wealth of nutrients as well as the efficacy of anti-cancer vegetables as the best.
sentences.chinese: 既能提供丰富的养分，又有抗癌功效的蔬菜当为最佳。

sentences.english: For the first time ever, scientists have been able to create a chemical element that can fight caner cells.
sentences.chinese: 科学家第一次能够创造出一种抗癌细胞的化学成分。

sentences.english: Scientists are also studying depsipeptides as possible anti-cancer agents.
sentences.chinese: 科学家也在进行缩肽类作为抗癌剂可行性的研究。

sentences.english: He hopes Pfizer can develop those home-run drugs.
sentences.chinese: 他希望辉瑞能研发出成功的抗癌药物，打出本垒打。

sentences.english: However the mechanisms mediating anti-cancer effect of ellagic acid, in general, remain unknown.
sentences.chinese: 可是其抗癌的普遍机制还不为人所知。

sentences.english: Chinese Society of Liver Cancer, Chinese Anti-Cancer Association.
sentences.chinese: 中国抗癌协会肝癌专业委员会。

sentences.english: The invention provides selenium-rich toad-cortex ultrafine powder with functions of cancer prevention and anticancer.
sentences.chinese: 本发明提供一种具有防癌抗癌作用的富硒蟾衣超微粉。

sentences.english: Chinese Society of Clinical Oncology, Chinese Anti-Cancer Association.
sentences.chinese: 中国抗癌协会临床肿瘤学协作专业委员会。

pinyin: huang2 tong2 lei4 hua4 he2 wu4
